abstract: Federal government begins collecting eye and facial scans of foreigners entering on foot at San Diego's Otay Mesa border crossing; scans are first step in effort to track people who stay in United States illegally after expiration of their visas.
lead_paragraph: The federal government on Thursday began collecting facial and eye scans of foreigners entering at a busy border crossing with Mexico.

headline.main: California: Trial Run Starts for Biometric Scans at Border
headline.print_headline: California: Trial Run Starts for Biometric Scans at Border

snippet: The federal government on Thursday began collecting facial and eye scans of foreigners entering at a busy border crossing with Mexico.
